text: @SpeakerPelosi @HouseDemocrats @ThisWeekABC Shake Shack is returning a $10M loan it received from the US government under an emergency program that was touted as a way to help small businesses pay workers & keep their operations running during the Covid-19 crisis. The chain has over 2000 employees, WOW!. Strange leadership

entity.name: This Week With George Stephanopoulos
entity.description: Former Clinton White House staffer and current co-anchor of ABC's weekday morning news show "Good Morning America," George Stephanopoulos offers a look at current events with a focus on the politics of the day. Each week's show includes interviews with top newsmakers (including some of the nation's top political leaders) as well as a roundtable discussion, usually featuring journalists from ABC and other news organizations, of the week's happenings. Since 2008, the program has broadcast from a studio at the Newseum in Washington, D.C.
